Reviews.Title: “Review of Eurostars Parc del Valles, Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Kelsey W
Reviews.Content: price reasonable five nights city centre bus stop front hotel road convenient taking bus friend train station free breakfast bummer hotel offered computer speed internet couple free maps barcelona stay recommend dont mind travelling outside city hotel

Reviews.Title: “Best price hotel but far away”
Reviews.Author: herolina
Reviews.Content: husband enjoyed stay hotel hotel centre taxi 6 euro bus stop front hotel didnt usethere bar opposite reception taste spanish international beers benefit limited food menuthe reception lobby bar staff friendlythe housekeeping inernet free breakfast pastries delicious

HotelInfo.Name: Eurostars Hotel Parc del Valles
HotelInfo.Address: C/ Artesans 2-8, 08290 Barcelona, Spain (Formerly Parc del Vallès Hotel)
